title: Open Syndrome Chlamydia
description: Laboratory detection of Chlamydia trachomatis in a clinical specimen.
organization: Institute of Environmental Science and Research

inclusion_criteria.name: uncomplicated infection of the lower anogenital tract
inclusion_criteria.description: Anogenital includes urogenital and anorectal infection.

inclusion_criteria.name: infection of another site (eg, eye or pharynx)
